main event: A civilian airline crew observed a space vehicle reentry from BOAC Airlines flight.
interesting points: The object was observed at a 15 degree elevation, moving from east to west.
The object split apart upon reentry.
The sighting was reported as a 'CIRVIS' (Communications Instructions for Reporting Vital Intelligence Sightings) report.
The sighting was evaluated as a space vehicle reentry, but no definitive evaluation was made.
The report was shared with multiple military and intelligence agencies, including the CIA.
